plot: The outbreak of the Serbian uprising against the Turks leaves a corrupt local chieftain struggling to find a way to a better life.
plot_en: The outbreak of the Serbian uprising against the Turks leaves a corrupt local chieftain struggling to find a way to a better life.
plot_es: The outbreak of the Serbian uprising against the Turks leaves a corrupt local chieftain struggling to find a way to a better life.
title: Crni Gruja
